alert.note: Alert for Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 2:10PM MDT until July 15 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Weld County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 245 PM MDT. * At 210 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles south of South Greeley, or 8 miles south of Cheyenne, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported half dollar size hail just south of Cheyenne. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Rockport around 230 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
